formattedAddress: 55 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 55 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
Washington Market School is a truly exceptional school that my son and our entire family love. The teachers go above and beyond to foster both academic and personal growth for every student.

Thanks to the nurturing, enthusiastic classroom environment the teachers have cultivated, my son looks forward to going to school each morning. They find creative and engaging ways to educate across different subjects and get the kids excited about learning.

Equally importantly, the school emphasizes developing confidence, resilience, and compassion for classmates. With a diverse community of students, Washington Market does a fantastic job celebrating kids' backgrounds through cross-cultural lessons, often facilitated in collaboration with families.

The teachers and administrative staff are highly approachable, responsive, and open to both student and parent feedback. There is a strong sense of community inclusion, communication, and continual improvement. We could not feel happier or more reassured about our son's education and the entire experience at Washington Market School. It truly stands out as a gem that makes each child feel excited to learn, explore their potential, and celebrate each other daily!

originalText.text: Washington Matket is a wonderful school that is dedicated to partnering with the families in the community to help raise and support their children. We have seen our daughter grow and flourish in her development ever since she started attending the school. The teachers are amazing and know your child inside and out. We could not be happier with sending our daughter to this PreK school!

originalText.text: As a WMS parent, I’ve found the school to be a wonderful, supportive environment for my child. The teachers and staff are all incredibly dedicated to the educational experience of the children. I highly recommend it to all of my friends and colleagues.

text.text: As a WMS parent, I’ve found the school to be a wonderful, supportive environment for my child. The teachers and staff are all incredibly dedicated to the educational experience of the children. I highly recommend it to all of my friends and colleagues.

originalText.text: Washington Market has continued to exceed our expectations in fostering a safe, loving, fun and community oriented environment for our children. We consider ourselves fortunate to be a part of such a special place!

text.text: Washington Market has continued to exceed our expectations in fostering a safe, loving, fun and community oriented environment for our children. We consider ourselves fortunate to be a part of such a special place!

originalText.text: Fabulous most perfect preschool in TriBeCa. Neighborhood fixture with long history. They do a good job at keeping a great mix of families. Good balance. They seem pretty advanced. Bravo. Alumni parent. Beautiful art show I remember. I hope they still do that.
